title: Characterization
text: OHDSI Characterization package lets users extract descriptive analyses observational healthcare data sets mapped OMOP CDM. currently four different types characterizations analyses (incidence rates, time--event, dechallenge-rechallenge various aggregate covariate cohort comparisons). Characterization package currently lets users answer following questions: Incidence Rate: often <add outcome> occur within <add time--risk> first record <add exposure/indication>? Time--event: <add outcome> occur relative first recorded <add exposure/indication>? common <add exposure>? Dechallenge-rechallenge: evidence <add outcome> causing <add exposure> discontinued <add outcome> re-occurring <add exposure> restarts? Cohort Comparison: different index patients <add exposure/outcome/indication> patients <add different exposure/outcome/indication>? Database Comparison: different index patients <add exposure/outcome/indication> across two OMOP CDM databases? Risk factors: risk factors <add outcome> occurring within <add time--risk> exposed <add exposure>? Case-series: happens cases (exposure <add exposure> <add outcome> <add time--risk>) exposure, exposure outcome start outcome start? bad cases prognosis?
